definition: emptiness/void/abstract theory or guiding principles/empty or unoccupied/diffident or timid/false/humble or modest/(of health) weak/virtual/in vain

sentences.english: Satiated , it finally slept, alone in the void.
sentences.chinese: 終於他滿足了，孤獨地沉睡在虛空之海。

sentences.english: I have seen all the works that are done under the sun; and, behold, all is vanity and vexation of spirit.
sentences.chinese: 我見日光之下所作的一切事，都是虛空，都是捕風。

sentences.english: We'll post an image of the netherwhelp, offspring of the nether drake flying mount, in the near future.
sentences.chinese: 我們將在捎後放出虛空飛龍幼崽的資料。

sentences.english: " I said in my heart, "This too is meaningless.
I have existed; to be back to nothingness is such a tragedy.
sentences.chinese: 已經存在過，如果還回虛空，真悲哀。

sentences.english: This too is meaningless, a chasing after the wind.
I have seen all the things that are done under the sun; all of them are meaningless, a chasing after the wind.
sentences.chinese: 我見日光之下所做的一切事，都是虛空，都是捕風。

sentences.english: The old lies, the empty values, the false perceptions?
sentences.chinese: 陳舊的謊言，虛空的價值，錯誤的觀點？

sentences.english: Cool energy drink spotted in the nether - regions of Bratislava.
sentences.chinese: 清涼飲料發現了虛空，布拉迪斯拉發地區。

sentences.english: For as the crackling of thorns under a pot, so [is] the laughter of the fool: this also [is] vanity.
sentences.chinese: 愚昧人的笑聲，好像鍋下燒荊棘的爆聲，這也是虛空。

sentences.english: This also is vanity and vexation of spirit.
I love the shield, but when you Sac the voidwalker you're screwed for a pet.
sentences.chinese: 我喜歡它的盾，但是當你犧牲虛空，你就沒有寵物了。

sentences.english: Shrink greediness to zero; broaden the scope of mind as vast as the universe.
sentences.chinese: 貪慾縮小到零點，愛心擴大遍虛空。

sentences.english: Without a meaning, like air in its clear nothingness.
sentences.chinese: 絲毫無心，猶如空氣帶着清澄的虛空。

sentences.english: This is also vanity, yea, it is a sore travail.
sentences.chinese: 這也是虛空，是極重的勞苦。

sentences.english: Should a wise man utter vain knowledge, and fill his belly with the east wind?
sentences.chinese: 智慧人豈可用虛空的知識回答，用東風充滿肚腹呢。

definition: to reincarnate/reincarnation (Buddhism)/(of the seasons etc) to follow each other cyclically/cycle/CL:個|个[ge4]
actual situation/the ultimate essence of things (Buddhism)
divine light (around the Buddha)/a halo/a miraculous column of light/(slang) jolly good!
variable/changeable/fickle/impermanence (Sanskrit: anitya)/ghost taking away the soul after death/to pass away/to die
the world of mortals (Buddhism)/human society/worldly affairs
